text: Tapa'i bhannus ki abhusana ra khane pi'une pavitra kuraharu juna allahale aphno upasakaharuko lagi bana'eko cha, tinala'i tyajya kasale bana'eko cha? Bhanidinus, yi kuraharu sansarika jivanama pani imana bha'ekaharuka nimti hun ra kiyamatako dina visesarupale tinaiko bhagama hunechan. Yasa prakara allahale usaka ayataharu bujhneharula'i spastarupale varnana gardacha
